name: Profit Square
description:
In profit square, your objective is to steal as much as you can and successfully escape. The local town square is a busy area, and the perfect spot to make a profit. But remember, there is no point to all of it if you get caught by the cops.

How to Play

  • Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move around. Hold the Shift Key to run.
  • Go near NPCs to check thier inventory and steal items by clicking the Left Mouse Button. You can stand near multiple NPCs and steal multiple items at once. You will always steal the item that is on top of the list first.
  • Make sure to avoid being in the line of sight of the person you are trying to rob and from cops in the area.
  • Press the I Key to open the Inventory and manage your items. You can discard items to clear up space. All items excluding cash take up space. (More space can be bought from the store)
  • If you are caught, the cops will try to chase you. You can try your best to run away, but cops who still have their guns can still stop you from a great distance.
  • You may be caught easily if you try to steal from cops, but if you manage to steal their gun, you can have a higher chance of escaping. (You can increase your chances by upgrading 'Cop Theft' in the store)
  • Approach any Taxi in the area and Press E to escape. You need to have a minimum of $100 of stolen items or cash to escape the area.
